card.name: Anathemancer
card.text: When Anathemancer enters the battlefield, it deals damage to target player equal to the number of nonbasic lands that player controls. Unearth {5}{B}{R}

card.name: Architects of Will
card.text: When Architects of Will enters the battlefield, look at the top three cards of target player's library, then put them back in any order. Cycling {UB}

card.name: Arsenal Thresher
card.text: As Arsenal Thresher enters the battlefield, you may reveal any number of other artifact cards from your hand. Arsenal Thresher enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each card revealed this way.

card.name: Aven Mimeomancer
card.text: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a feather counter on target creature. If you do, that creature is 3/1 and has flying for as long as it has a feather counter on it.

card.name: Bant Sojourners
card.text: When you cycle Bant Sojourners or it dies, you may put a 1/1 white Soldier creature token onto the battlefield. Cycling {2}{W}

card.name: Bant Sureblade
card.text: As long as you control another multicolored permanent, Bant Sureblade gets +1/+1 and has first strike.

card.name: Behemoth Sledge
card.text: Equipped creature gets +2/+2 and has lifelink and trample. Equip {3}

card.name: Bituminous Blast
card.text: Cascade Bituminous Blast deals 4 damage to target creature.

card.name: Blitz Hellion
card.text: Trample, haste At the beginning of the end step, Blitz Hellion's owner shuffles it into his or her library.

card.name: Brainbite
card.text: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose a card from it. That player discards that card. Draw a card.

card.name: Breath of Malfegor
card.text: Breath of Malfegor deals 5 damage to each opponent.

card.name: Captured Sunlight
card.text: Cascade You gain 4 life.

card.name: Cerodon Yearling
card.text: Vigilance, haste

card.name: Cloven Casting
card.text: Whenever you cast a multicolored instant or sorcery spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

card.name: Colossal Might
card.text: Target creature gets +4/+2 and gains trample until end of turn.

card.name: Crystallization
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block. When enchanted creature becomes the target of a spell or ability, exile that creature.

card.name: Dauntless Escort
card.text: Sacrifice Dauntless Escort: Creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn.

card.name: Deadshot Minotaur
card.text: When Deadshot Minotaur enters the battlefield, it deals 3 damage to target creature with flying. Cycling {RG}

card.name: Deathbringer Thoctar
card.text: Whenever another creature dies, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Deathbringer Thoctar. Remove a +1/+1 counter from Deathbringer Thoctar: Deathbringer Thoctar deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Defiler of Souls
card.text: Flying At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player sacrifices a monocolored creature.

card.name: Demonic Dread
card.text: Cascade Target creature can't block this turn.

card.name: Demonspine Whip
card.text: {X}: Equipped creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn. Equip {1}

card.name: Deny Reality
card.text: Cascade Return target permanent to its owner's hand.

card.name: Double Negative
card.text: Counter up to two target spells.

card.name: Dragon Appeasement
card.text: Skip your draw step. Whenever you sacrifice a creature, you may draw a card.

card.name: Dragon Broodmother
card.text: Flying At the beginning of each upkeep, put a 1/1 red and green Dragon creature token with flying and devour 2 onto the battlefield.

card.name: Drastic Revelation
card.text: Discard your hand. Draw seven cards, then discard three cards at random.

card.name: Enigma Sphinx
card.text: Flying When Enigma Sphinx is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, put it into your library third from the top. Cascade

card.name: Esper Sojourners
card.text: When you cycle Esper Sojourners or it dies, you may tap or untap target permanent. Cycling {2}{U}

card.name: Esper Stormblade
card.text: As long as you control another multicolored permanent, Esper Stormblade gets +1/+1 and has flying.

card.name: Etherium Abomination
card.text: Unearth {1}{U}{B}

card.name: Ethersworn Shieldmage
card.text: Flash When Ethersworn Shieldmage enters the battlefield, prevent all damage that would be dealt to artifact creatures this turn.

card.name: Etherwrought Page
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, choose one - You gain 2 life; or look at the top card of your library, then you may put that card into your graveyard; or each opponent loses 1 life.

card.name: Fieldmist Borderpost
card.text: You may pay {1} and return a basic land you control to its owner's hand rather than pay Fieldmist Borderpost's mana cost. Fieldmist Borderpost enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W} or {U} to your mana pool.

card.name: Fight to the Death
card.text: Destroy all blocking creatures and all blocked creatures.

card.name: Filigree Angel
card.text: Flying When Filigree Angel enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life for each artifact you control.

card.name: Finest Hour
card.text: Exalted Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, if it's the first combat phase of the turn, untap that creature. After this phase, there is an additional combat phase.

card.name: Firewild Borderpost
card.text: You may pay {1} and return a basic land you control to its owner's hand rather than pay Firewild Borderpost's mana cost. Firewild Borderpost enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R} or {G} to your mana pool.

card.name: Flurry of Wings
card.text: Put X 1/1 white Bird Soldier creature tokens with flying onto the battlefield, where X is the number of attacking creatures.

card.name: Giant Ambush Beetle
card.text: Haste When Giant Ambush Beetle enters the battlefield, you may have target creature block it this turn if able.

card.name: Glassdust Hulk
card.text: Whenever another artifact enters the battlefield under your control, Glassdust Hulk gets +1/+1 until end of turn and can't be blocked this turn. Cycling {WU}

card.name: Glory of Warfare
card.text: As long as it's your turn, creatures you control get +2/+0. As long as it's not your turn, creatures you control get +0/+2.

card.name: Gloryscale Viashino
card.text: Whenever you cast a multicolored spell, Gloryscale Viashino gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

card.name: Godtracker of Jund
card.text: Whenever a creature with power 5 or greater enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Godtracker of Jund.

card.name: Gorger Wurm
card.text: Devour 1

card.name: Grixis Grimblade
card.text: As long as you control another multicolored permanent, Grixis Grimblade gets +1/+1 and has deathtouch.

card.name: Grixis Sojourners
card.text: When you cycle Grixis Sojourners or it dies, you may exile target card from a graveyard. Cycling {2}{B}

card.name: Identity Crisis
card.text: Exile all cards from target player's hand and graveyard.

card.name: Igneous Pouncer
card.text: Haste Swampcycling {2}, mountaincycling {2}

card.name: Illusory Demon
card.text: Flying When you cast a spell, sacrifice Illusory Demon.

card.name: Intimidation Bolt
card.text: Intimidation Bolt deals 3 damage to target creature. Other creatures can't attack this turn.

card.name: Jenara, Asura of War
card.text: Flying {1}{W}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Jenara, Asura of War.

card.name: Jhessian Zombies
card.text: Fear Islandcycling {2}, swampcycling {2}

card.name: Jund Hackblade
card.text: As long as you control another multicolored permanent, Jund Hackblade gets +1/+1 and has haste.

card.name: Jund Sojourners
card.text: When you cycle Jund Sojourners or it dies, you may have it deal 1 damage to target creature or player. Cycling {2}{R}

card.name: Karrthus, Tyrant of Jund
card.text: Flying, haste When Karrthus, Tyrant of Jund enters the battlefield, gain control of all Dragons, then untap all Dragons. Other Dragon creatures you control have haste.

card.name: Kathari Bomber
Kathari Remnant
card.text: Flying {B}: Regenerate Kathari Remnant. Cascade

card.name: Knight of New Alara
card.text: Each other multicolored creature you control gets +1/+1 for each of its colors.

card.name: Knotvine Paladin
card.text: Whenever Knotvine Paladin attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each untapped creature you control.

card.name: Lavalanche
card.text: Lavalanche deals X damage to target player and each creature he or she controls.

card.name: Leonin Armorguard
card.text: When Leonin Armorguard enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Lich Lord of Unx
card.text: {U}{B}, {T}: Put a 1/1 blue and black Zombie Wizard creature token onto the battlefield. {U}{U}{B}{B}: Target player loses X life and puts the top X cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard, where X is the number of Zombies you control.

card.name: Lightning Reaver
card.text: Haste; fear Whenever Lightning Reaver deals combat damage to a player, put a charge counter on it. At the beginning of your end step, Lightning Reaver deals damage equal to the number of charge counters on it to each opponent.

card.name: Lord of Extinction
card.text: Lord of Extinction's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in all graveyards.

card.name: Lorescale Coatl
card.text: Whenever you draw a card, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Lorescale Coatl.

card.name: Madrush Cyclops
card.text: Creatures you control have haste.

card.name: Maelstrom Nexus
card.text: The first spell you cast each turn has cascade.

card.name: Maelstrom Pulse
card.text: Destroy target nonland permanent and all other permanents with the same name as that permanent.

card.name: Mage Slayer
card.text: Whenever equipped creature attacks, it deals damage equal to its power to defending player. Equip {3}

card.name: Magefire Wings
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+0 and has flying.

card.name: Marisi's Twinclaws
card.text: Double strike

card.name: Marrow Chomper
card.text: Devour 2 When Marrow Chomper enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life for each creature it devoured.

card.name: Mask of Riddles
Mayael's Aria
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control if you control a creature with power 5 or greater. Then you gain 10 life if you control a creature with power 10 or greater. Then you win the game if you control a creature with power 20 or greater.

card.name: Meddling Mage
card.text: As Meddling Mage enters the battlefield, name a nonland card. The named card can't be cast.

card.name: Messenger Falcons
card.text: Flying When Messenger Falcons enters the battlefield, draw a card.

card.name: Mind Funeral
card.text: Target opponent reveals cards from the top of his or her library until four land cards are revealed. That player puts all cards revealed this way into his or her graveyard.

card.name: Mistvein Borderpost
card.text: You may pay {1} and return a basic land you control to its owner's hand rather than pay Mistvein Borderpost's mana cost. Mistvein Borderpost enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U} or {B} to your mana pool.

card.name: Monstrous Carabid
card.text: Monstrous Carabid attacks each turn if able. Cycling {BR}

card.name: Morbid Bloom
card.text: Exile target creature card from a graveyard, then put X 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens onto the battlefield, where X is the exiled card's toughness.

card.name: Mycoid Shepherd
card.text: Whenever Mycoid Shepherd or another creature you control with power 5 or greater dies, you may gain 5 life.

card.name: Naya Hushblade
card.text: As long as you control another multicolored permanent, Naya Hushblade gets +1/+1 and has shroud.

card.name: Naya Sojourners
card.text: When you cycle Naya Sojourners or it dies, you may put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Cycling {2}{G}

card.name: Necromancer's Covenant
card.text: When Necromancer's Covenant enters the battlefield, exile all creature cards from target player's graveyard, then put a 2/2 black Zombie creature token onto the battlefield for each card exiled this way. Zombies you control have lifelink.

card.name: Nemesis of Reason
card.text: Whenever Nemesis of Reason attacks, defending player puts the top ten cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

card.name: Nulltread Gargantuan
card.text: When Nulltread Gargantuan enters the battlefield, put a creature you control on top of its owner's library.

card.name: Offering to Asha
card.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {4}. You gain 4 life.

card.name: Pale Recluse
card.text: Reach Forestcycling {2}, plainscycling {2}

card.name: Predatory Advantage
card.text: At the beginning of each opponent's end step, if that player didn't cast a creature spell this turn, put a 2/2 green Lizard creature token onto the battlefield.

card.name: Putrid Leech
card.text: Pay 2 life: Putrid Leech gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.

card.name: Qasali Pridemage
card.text: Exalted {1}, Sacrifice Qasali Pridemage: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

card.name: Reborn Hope
card.text: Return target multicolored card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Retaliator Griffin
card.text: Flying Whenever a source an opponent controls deals damage to you, you may put that many +1/+1 counters on Retaliator Griffin.

card.name: Sages of the Anima
card.text: If you would draw a card, instead reveal the top three cards of your library. Put all creature cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Sanctum Plowbeast
card.text: Defender Plainscycling {2}, islandcycling {2}

card.name: Sangrite Backlash
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/-3.

card.name: Sanity Gnawers
card.text: When Sanity Gnawers enters the battlefield, target player discards a card at random.

card.name: Sen Triplets
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, choose target opponent. This turn, that player can't cast spells or activate abilities and plays with his or her hand revealed. You may play cards from that player's hand this turn.

card.name: Sewn-Eye Drake
card.text: Flying, haste

card.name: Shield of the Righteous
Sigil Captain
card.text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature is 1/1, put two +1/+1 counters on it.

card.name: Sigil of the Nayan Gods
Singe-Mind Ogre
card.text: When Singe-Mind Ogre enters the battlefield, target player reveals a card at random from his or her hand, then loses life equal to that card's converted mana cost.

card.name: Skyclaw Thrash
card.text: Whenever Skyclaw Thrash attacks, flip a coin. If you win the flip, Skyclaw Thrash gets +1/+1 and gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: Slave of Bolas
card.text: Gain control of target creature. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Soul Manipulation
card.text: Choose one or both - Counter target creature spell; and/or return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Soulquake
card.text: Return all creatures on the battlefield and all creature cards in graveyards to their owners' hands.

card.name: Sovereigns of Lost Alara
card.text: Exalted Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, you may search your library for an Aura card that could enchant that creature, put it onto the battlefield attached to that creature, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Spellbound Dragon
card.text: Flying Whenever Spellbound Dragon attacks, draw a card, then discard a card. Spellbound Dragon gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the discarded card's converted mana cost.

card.name: Spellbreaker Behemoth
card.text: Spellbreaker Behemoth can't be countered. Creature spells you control with power 5 or greater can't be countered.

card.name: Sphinx of the Steel Wind
card.text: Flying, first strike, vigilance, lifelink, protection from red and from green

card.name: Stormcaller's Boon
card.text: Sacrifice Stormcaller's Boon: Creatures you control gain flying until end of turn. Cascade

card.name: Stun Sniper
card.text: {1}, {T}: Stun Sniper deals 1 damage to target creature. Tap that creature.

card.name: Tainted Sigil
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice Tainted Sigil: You gain life equal to the total life lost by all players this turn.

card.name: Terminate
card.text: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated.

card.name: Thopter Foundry
card.text: {1}, Sacrifice a nontoken artifact: Put a 1/1 blue Thopter artifact creature token with flying onto the battlefield. You gain 1 life.

card.name: Thought Hemorrhage
card.text: Name a nonland card. Target player reveals his or her hand. Thought Hemorrhage deals 3 damage to that player for each card with that name revealed this way. Search that player's graveyard, hand, and library for all cards with that name and exile them. Then that player shuffles his or her library.

card.name: Thraximundar
card.text: Haste Whenever Thraximundar attacks, defending player sacrifices a creature. Whenever a player sacrifices a creature, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Thraximundar.

card.name: Time Sieve
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice five artifacts: Take an extra turn after this one.

card.name: Trace of Abundance
card.text: Enchant land Enchanted land has shroud. Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds one mana of any color to his or her mana pool.

card.name: Unbender Tine
card.text: {T}: Untap another target permanent.

card.name: Unscythe, Killer of Kings
Uril, the Miststalker
card.text: Hexproof Uril, the Miststalker gets +2/+2 for each Aura attached to it.

card.name: Valley Rannet
card.text: Mountaincycling {2}, forestcycling {2}

card.name: Vectis Dominator
card.text: {T}: Tap target creature unless its controller pays 2 life.

card.name: Vedalken Ghoul
card.text: Whenever Vedalken Ghoul becomes blocked, defending player loses 4 life.

card.name: Vedalken Heretic
card.text: Whenever Vedalken Heretic deals damage to an opponent, you may draw a card.

card.name: Veinfire Borderpost
card.text: You may pay {1} and return a basic land you control to its owner's hand rather than pay Veinfire Borderpost's mana cost. Veinfire Borderpost enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {B} or {R} to your mana pool.

card.name: Vengeful Rebirth
card.text: Return target card from your graveyard to your hand. If you return a nonland card to your hand this way, Vengeful Rebirth deals damage equal to that card's converted mana cost to target creature or player. Exile Vengeful Rebirth.

card.name: Violent Outburst
card.text: Cascade Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Vithian Renegades
card.text: When Vithian Renegades enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact.

card.name: Wall of Denial
card.text: Defender, flying Shroud

card.name: Wargate
card.text: Search your library for a permanent card with converted mana cost X or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Wildfield Borderpost
card.text: You may pay {1} and return a basic land you control to its owner's hand rather than pay Wildfield Borderpost's mana cost. Wildfield Borderpost enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G} or {W} to your mana pool.

card.name: Zealous Persecution
card.text: Until end of turn, creatures you control get +1/+1 and creatures your opponents control get -1/-1.
